hero.subtitle: Fast, reliable and professional property maintenance and cleaning in Berlin. Discover all our services tailored to your needs.
Havenova is a young company in Berlin providing home cleaning and maintenance services, focused on customer satisfaction and digital solutions.

services.title: What We Offer
services.description: We provide a wide range of cleaning and home maintenance services to keep your home in great condition.

testimonials.title: What Our Clients Say
testimonials.description: We value every opinion and learn from each experience. Here are some of the reviews we’ve received.
testimonials.placeholder: This space can display real testimonials or integrate with Google/MyHammer.

finalCta.headline: Ready to book your first service?
finalCta.subtext: Let us help you keep your home clean, organized, and in good hands.

faqHero.headline2: Everything you need to know about Havenova
faqHero.subtitle: Here you’ll find answers to the most common questions about our services, bookings, and payment options. If your question isn’t listed, our support team is always ready to help.

items.question: What is Havenova and how does the platform work?
items.answer: Havenova is a digital platform for home and building services in Berlin. Customers can request services such as cleaning, repairs, or furniture assembly online, compare offers, and book appointments directly.

items.question: Do I need to create an account to book a service?
items.answer: No, you can book services without creating an account. However, having an account gives you benefits such as saved addresses, access to discount promotions, and an overview of your previous bookings.

items.question: How are your services different from other providers?
items.answer: We focus on transparency, flexibility, and reliable customer service. Our services are fully customizable, and we work with qualified professionals who are insured and carefully vetted.

items.question: How can I contact customer support?
items.answer: Our support team is available Monday to Friday from 9:00 to 18:00 by email or phone. Members also benefit from priority support with shorter response times.

items.question: What is the typical booking process?
items.answer: You choose the service you need on our website, provide the details, and submit your request. Our team reviews the information and confirms the appointment or prepares a custom offer for you.

items.question: Can I book services at short notice?
items.answer: Yes, many services can be provided within 24–48 hours. For urgent cases, we always do our best to find the fastest possible solution.

items.question: Can I cancel or change my booking?
items.answer: Yes, changes and cancellations are free up to 24 hours before the appointment. For later cancellations, a cancellation fee may apply.

items.question: Will I receive a booking confirmation?
items.answer: Yes, after every request and confirmed appointment you will receive an email with all relevant details, and you can also view it in your customer dashboard.

items.question: How are prices calculated?
items.answer: Our prices depend on the type, duration, and scope of the service. For standard services, we offer transparent flat rates, while individual jobs require a tailored offer.

items.question: Which payment methods do you accept?
items.answer: We accept major payment methods including credit card, PayPal, and SEPA direct debit. For regular customers, payment by invoice is also possible.

items.question: Are there any hidden costs?
items.answer: No, all costs are shown transparently before booking. If additional work is needed during the job, we will always discuss it with you first.

items.question: Do I receive an invoice?
items.answer: Yes, after every completed service you will automatically receive a digital invoice by email, which is also available for download in your customer dashboard.

items.question: Are your employees insured?
items.answer: Yes, all of our employees and partners are fully insured. Any damage that may occur during a service is covered by our liability insurance.

items.question: How do you ensure service quality?
items.answer: We carefully select our staff, provide them with regular training, and collect customer feedback to continuously improve our services.

items.question: Do you work with external specialists?
items.answer: Yes, for specialized tasks such as electrical work, plumbing, or painting, we cooperate with certified professionals to ensure the highest quality and safety standards.

items.question: What happens if I am not satisfied with the service?
items.answer: Your satisfaction is our top priority. If you are unhappy with a service, please contact us immediately. We will review the case and find a solution together, whether that means rework or a refund.

contactSection.heading: Didn’t find your answer?
contactSection.description: Send us your question and we’ll get back to you as soon as possible.

hero.subtitle: Do you have questions about our services or need support? Fill out the form or use the contact details below – our team will get back to you as soon as possible.

hero.subtitle: This policy explains how Havenova handles your personal data through this platform, operated technically by Maped Solutions UG.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: Your privacy matters. We process your data in compliance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR). Here’s a summary of who is responsible, why and how we process your data, which third parties are involved, and what rights you have.
bullets: Data Processor: Maped Solutions UG (Art. 28 GDPR).
Main legal bases: contract (Art. 6(1)(b)), legal obligation (Art. 6(1)(c)), legitimate interest (Art. 6(1)(f)), and consent (Art. 6(1)(a)).

controller.title: Data Controller
controller.body: The data controller is Havenova, located at Stollberger Str.43, 12627 Berlin. You can contact them at contact@havenova.de.

processor.title: Data Processor
processor.body: Maped Solutions UG acts as the data processor under Art. 28 GDPR, operating the platform on behalf of Havenova. Technical contact: support@mapedsolutions.de.

purposesAndLegalBases.title: Purposes and Legal Bases
purposesAndLegalBases.intro: We only process your data for clear and legitimate purposes.

examples.title: Examples:
examples.description: creating an account, handling requests, reservations, offers, and invoicing

dataCategories.title: Types of Data Processed
dataCategories.description: Depending on your use of the platform, we may collect:
items: Identification and contact information (name, email, phone, address).
Account and security data (hashed password, language, roles).
Request and service details (types, descriptions, locations, dates).
Contract and payment data (accepted offers, invoices, payment via third parties).
Technical data (IP address, device, logs, cookies based on your preferences).

thirdParties.title: Third-Party Providers
thirdParties.subtitle: We use specialized providers to ensure secure and efficient service delivery.
thirdParties.intro: Below is a dynamically generated list of external services (hosting, database, email, CDN, payments) with their purposes and privacy policies.

security.title: Security Measures (Art. 32 GDPR)
security.body: We apply appropriate technical and organizational measures to protect your data: encrypted passwords (bcrypt), httpOnly/secure cookies, role-based access control, HTTPS, WAF/CDN (Cloudflare), anomaly monitoring, and EU-preferred storage whenever possible. Infrastructure providers apply encryption in transit (TLS) and at rest.

cookies.title: Cookies and Similar Technologies
cookies.body: We use essential cookies for core functionality. Analytics and marketing cookies are only used with your explicit consent. You can manage your preferences at any time.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.intro: Under the GDPR, you have the following rights:
items: Access (Art. 15), Rectification (Art. 16), Erasure (Art. 17), Restriction (Art. 18).
Portability (Art. 20), Objection (Art. 21).
Withdraw consent at any time (Art. 7(3)).
userRights.howTo: To exercise your rights, contact us at contact@havenova.de or via our contact page.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.body: We retain data only as long as needed to fulfill the intended purposes and comply with legal obligations. For example, invoices and accounting records are kept for 10 years unless otherwise required.

internationalTransfers.title: International Transfers
internationalTransfers.body: If data is transferred outside the EEA, appropriate safeguards (such as Standard Contractual Clauses) are in place. Whenever possible, we configure services to use EU-based data centers. Current EU preference status: Active.

changes.title: Policy Changes
changes.body: We may update this policy due to legal or operational reasons. Major changes will be communicated through the app or by email.

hero.headline2: Use of Cookies and Similar Technologies
hero.subtitle: This page explains how and why cookies are used on this platform, which is technically operated by Maped Solutions UG.

overview.title: Overview
overview.intro: We use cookies and similar technologies to ensure the operation of this platform and to continuously improve your user experience. Some cookies are technically necessary, others require your explicit consent.
bullets: Technically necessary cookies for core functions.
Analytics cookies for anonymous usage analysis.
No marketing or tracking cookies used.
You can change your preferences at any time.

whatAreCookies.title: What are cookies?
whatAreCookies.body: Cookies are small text files that are stored on your device when you visit a website. They allow your browser to be recognized and can store certain information such as login status or language preferences for future visits.

types.title: What types of cookies do we use?

items.name: Essential cookies
items.description: These cookies ensure the platform works correctly – e.g. for login, navigation, and security. They cannot be disabled.

items.name: Analytics cookies
items.description: These cookies help us understand how users interact with the platform – e.g. which pages are visited or which features are used. The data is anonymized and used only for internal improvements.

thirdParties.title: Third-party services
thirdParties.body: We use external services for technical analysis and payment processing. These services are configured to comply with data protection laws. The data is collected anonymously and not used for advertising purposes.

body.name: Google Analytics
body.purpose: Anonymous analysis of user behavior (page views, interactions). Used to optimize the platform.

body.name: Stripe
body.purpose: Secure payment processing. No user interaction is analyzed.

body.name: PayPal
body.purpose: Handles payments for users with PayPal accounts. No profiling is performed by Maped Solutions.

localStorage.title: Use of localStorage
localStorage.body: In addition to cookies, we use the browser's localStorage to store preferences like language, theme, or guest avatar. This data stays on your device and is not shared with any third party.

management.title: Managing cookies
management.intro: You can change your cookie preferences at any time through the banner or via your browser settings.
methods: Accept or reject cookies in the initial banner.
Use browser settings to block or delete cookies.
Access the cookie settings via the footer at any time.

legalBasis.title: Legal basis
legalBasis.body: Non-essential cookies (like analytics) are only set with your consent (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. a GDPR). Essential cookies are based on our legitimate interest in ensuring secure and functional operation of the platform (Art. 6 para. 1 lit. f GDPR).

changes.title: Changes to this policy
changes.body: This policy may be updated due to legal or technical reasons. The date of the last change is shown below:

hero.headline2: General Conditions for Using the Platform
hero.subtitle: This document outlines the rights and obligations between users and the service provider using this platform, which is technically operated by Maped Solutions UG.

intro.title: Introduction
intro.body: By accessing or using our services, you agree to these Terms of Service. If you do not agree with any part of these terms, you should not use the platform.

scope.title: Scope of Service
scope.body: This platform allows users to request maintenance, cleaning, and home assistance services, receive personalized offers, schedule appointments, and communicate with the service provider. Some services are performed directly by the provider, while others (e.g., electrical repairs, painting) are carried out by external contractors.

userObligations.title: User Obligations
items: Provide truthful and up-to-date information during use.
Do not use the platform for illegal, abusive, or fraudulent purposes.
Respect third-party rights, especially in shared living environments.
Do not interfere with the technical operation of the platform.
Keep your login credentials confidential.

providerRights.title: Provider Rights
items: Modify, suspend, or limit certain features for technical or legal reasons.
Reject or cancel requests that violate these terms.
Update these terms to reflect legal or operational changes.
Offer special conditions or pricing depending on customer type or location.

payments.title: Payments and Conditions
payments.body: Use of the services provided may be subject to fees. Accepting an offer constitutes acceptance of the terms and pricing provided.
items: Prices are defined individually based on the service type and complexity.
Payments are processed through third-party providers such as Stripe or PayPal.
If canceled less than 24 hours before the appointment, a cancellation fee of 25% of the agreed amount will apply.
Unless otherwise specified, payment is due after service completion.

cancellation.title: Cancellation and Termination
cancellation.body: Users may cancel confirmed appointments. If canceled within 24 hours of the appointment, a fee will apply as outlined in the 'Payments' section. The provider reserves the right to suspend platform access in case of repeated abuse or inappropriate behavior.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.body: The provider is not liable for indirect damages, economic losses, or service interruptions caused by third parties, contractors, or force majeure. Liability for material damages is limited to the value of the contracted service and shall not exceed the provider’s professional insurance coverage of €3 million. Users are responsible for ensuring safe access to the service location.

changes.title: Changes to the Terms
changes.body: These terms may be updated due to legal, technical, or business reasons. The updated document will be published on this page with the date of last modification.

odrSection.heading: Online Dispute Resolution (ODR)
odrSection.text:
The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (ODR): [https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr](https://ec.europa.eu/consumers/odr).

We are not obliged or willing to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.

howItWorks.title: How it works
howItWorks.subtitle: Seamless, transparent, and reliable
howItWorks.description: Our process is designed to make your life easier. Submit your request in just a few steps, receive a personalized offer, and get professional help exactly when you need it. We value communication, reliability, and flexibility in every service we provide.

steps.title: Request Service
steps.description: Submit your details online or by phone – quick, simple, and directly through our app.

steps.title: Receive Offer
steps.description: We review your needs and send you a personalized service offer to your request.

steps.title: Get the Service
steps.description: Our professionals complete the service at your preferred time, reliably and with care.

servicesPreview.title: Our Services
servicesPreview.subtitle: Tailored solutions for your home
servicesPreview.description: From furniture assembly to deep cleaning – we deliver reliable services for every situation. Discover how we can help you today.

story.title: A Young Company with a Clear Vision
paragraphs: Havenova was founded in 2023 with a clear idea: to offer home cleaning and maintenance services in Berlin with the customer at the center.
From the beginning, the company has worked to stand out by focusing on customer experience and maintaining clear and professional communication at every stage of the service.

In its first years, Havenova has actively participated in the development of this digital platform together with Maped Solutions. This tool was created to simplify service requests, improve communication, and offer full transparency to users.
Our focus remains the same: to improve every day, adapt to the needs of our clients, and continue developing digital solutions that benefit both customers and companies in the sector.

whyChoose.title: Why Choose Havenova?
whyChoose.description: At Havenova, we combine traditional services with modern transparency. Our goal is to make the entire process – from request to completion – as simple, reliable, and customer-focused as possible. The following points highlight what sets us apart from others.

points.title: Commitment to quality in every task

testimonials.title: Trusted by Berlin households.
testimonials.subtitle: See what our customers are saying.
testimonials.description: At Havenova, we continually strive to improve our services. Your feedback helps us develop better solutions and enhance our offerings.

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Kleinmachnow
items.text: So wie besprochen. Pünktlich. Schnell. Preis ok. Gerne wieder. Dank dir nochmal!!

items.author: Kittel, Berlin
items.text: Hassan ist der perfekte Handwerker, hilfsbereit, kreativ, findet immer eine Lösung und macht seine Arbeit sehr gut! ...

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
items.text: Sehr schnelle Auftragsannahme und Ausführung. Möglichkeiten wurden abgesprochen; sehr gute Ausführung. Vielen Dank! Gerne wieder.

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
items.text: Der Auftrag wurde sehr zeitnah und ordentlich ausgeführt. Kommunikation einwandfrei, sofort reagiert. Sehr empfehlenswert!

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
items.text: Sehr freundlich und zuverlässig. Arbeiten schnell und zu meiner Zufriedenheit erledigt.

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
items.text: Sehr enttäuscht ... (lange Beschwerde über Verspätung, Material, Werkzeuge, Abbruch der Arbeiten).

reply.text: Es tut uns leid, dass Sie unzufrieden waren. Unsere Vereinbarung umfasste Zimmer+Flur sowie Laminat (ohne Materialien und ohne Türen). Spätere Änderungen wurden hinzugefügt. Wir bemühen uns stets um bestmögliche Arbeit und stehen für Klärungen bereit.

items.author: Sabine, Berlin
items.text: Super schnelle Antwort und Termin, sehr freundlich und zuverlässig. Für alles eine Lösung! Top, wir sind begeistert.

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
items.text: Top-Leistung. Kurzfristige Terminvereinbarung, pünktlich, zuverlässig, professionell, freundlich. Bei Bedarf gerne wieder.

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
items.text: Schneller Termin. Saubere Arbeit. Gerne wieder.

items.author: MyHammer-Kunde aus Berlin
items.text: Sehr zufrieden mit der Umsetzung. Ersatzarmatur direkt besorgt und schnell eingebaut. Alles problemlos.

items.author: Mashu, Berlin
items.text: Sauber gearbeitet, höflich und pünktlich. Auf jeden Fall weiterzuempfehlen.

items.author: Sarah Ullrich, Berlin
items.text: Sehr schnelle Verfügbarkeit, kompetent, sympathisch! Preis-Leistung ok, Kommunikation super!

items.author: Kristina, Berlin
items.text: Sehr freundlich, schnell und zuverlässig. Wasserhahn & Filter super installiert. Sehr zu empfehlen.

list.label: Transparency
list.description: We believe in clear and honest communication at every stage – from inquiry to execution.

list.label: Quality
list.description: We deliver meticulous work with attention to detail and a strong commitment to professionalism.

list.label: Innovation
list.description: We actively contribute to the development of digital tools to enhance the customer experience.

list.label: Empathy
list.description: We foster professional yet human relationships with our clients, characterized by respect and understanding.

items.question: What services does Havenova offer?
items.answer: Havenova offers a wide range of home and property services in Berlin, including professional cleaning, small repairs, regular maintenance, and assistance with moving or furniture assembly. Our goal is to provide reliable and flexible support for both private households and businesses, so you can focus on what matters most while we take care of the rest.

items.question: How quickly can I book a service?
items.answer: Most services can be scheduled within 24–48 hours after we receive your request. Once you submit your details through our platform, our team reviews them and confirms an appointment that works best for you. For urgent cases, we always try to find the fastest possible solution.

items.question: Are your employees qualified and insured?
items.answer: Yes, all our team members and partner contractors are carefully selected, trained, and fully insured. This ensures that the work is carried out safely and professionally. We also work with trusted specialists for tasks such as electrical or painting work, so you always get the right expertise.

items.question: Are there discounts for members?
items.answer: Yes, Havenova members enjoy exclusive benefits such as up to 20% discounts on services, faster response times, and an annual apartment check-up. Membership is designed to give you more value and peace of mind throughout the year.

cta.title: Still have questions?
cta.description: Find more detailed answers on our FAQ page or get in touch if your question is not listed.

finalCta.headline: Ready to simplify your home services?
finalCta.subheadline: Book a service today and enjoy professional support within 24–48 hours. Our trusted team takes care of cleaning, repairs, and maintenance so you can focus on what matters most.

cookieBanner.title: Cookies on this website
cookieBanner.description: We use essential cookies to ensure the website functions properly. With your permission, we also use analytics cookies to monitor site usage and improve user experience. We do not collect data for advertising or profiling.

CALENDAR_CREATED.title: Calendar Created
CALENDAR_CREATED.description: The calendar was successfully created and is now available in your dashboard.

CALENDAR_CREATION_FAILED.title: Calendar Creation Failed
CALENDAR_CREATION_FAILED.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the calendar. Please try again later.

WORKER_CREATED.title: Worker created
WORKER_CREATED.description: The new worker was successfully registered and an email has been sent.

WORKER_MISSING_CLIENT_ID.title: Missing Client ID
WORKER_MISSING_CLIENT_ID.description: No valid client ID was provided.

WORKER_ROLES_INVALID.title: Invalid role
WORKER_ROLES_INVALID.description: One or more selected roles are not allowed.

WORKER_DUPLICATE.title: Email already in use
WORKER_DUPLICATE.description: This email is already associated with another worker.

WORKER_CREATE_FAILED.title: Creation failed
WORKER_CREATE_FAILED.description: An unexpected error occurred while creating the worker.

CONTACT_MESSAGE_CREATED.title: Message created
CONTACT_MESSAGE_CREATED.description: Your contact request has been submitted successfully. Please verify your email address to proceed.

CONTACT_VERIFIED.title: Email verified
CONTACT_VERIFIED.description: Your email address has been successfully verified. We will process your request as soon as possible.

CONTACT_MESSAGE_RESPONDED.title: Message responded
CONTACT_MESSAGE_RESPONDED.description: Your inquiry has been answered by our team. Please check your inbox or dashboard for details.

CONTACT_VERIFICATION_INVALID.title: Invalid verification
CONTACT_VERIFICATION_INVALID.description: The verification link is invalid or has expired. Please request a new confirmation.

CONTACT_CREATE_FAILED.title: Creation failed
CONTACT_CREATE_FAILED.description: An error occurred while creating your contact request. Please try again.

CONTACT_VERIFY_FAILED.title: Verification failed
CONTACT_VERIFY_FAILED.description: An error occurred while verifying your email. Please try again.

CONTACT_RESPONSE_FAILED.title: Response failed
CONTACT_RESPONSE_FAILED.description: An error occurred while saving your response. Please try again later.

GLOBAL_INTERNAL_ERROR.title: Unexpected Error
GLOBAL_INTERNAL_ERROR.description: Something went wrong on our side. Please try again later or contact support.

SESSION_EXPIRED.title: Session expired
SESSION_EXPIRED.description: Your session has expired. Please log in again to continue.

name.label: Name
name.description: Your dream home begins with us
